about_the_game:
Imagine you are humanity's last hope, on an epic mission through the vastness of the universe.
In a future where Earth is no longer an option, humanity has set out in gigantic terraforming ships in search of a new home. These ships are not only technological marvels, but also house the digital images of all human souls who place their hopes and dreams in your hands.

You, the Archeget, carry a burden as immense as the universe itself. Your mission: to explore, analyse and validate new worlds. The decision as to whether a world becomes the new home of mankind is yours alone. But be warned: this is no ordinary stroll through space. Every decision you make has the potential to shape the fate of billions.

Your adventure begins on the way to a mysterious planet with the identifier "PBT-30.405-ARCNM". As you prepare for the crucial trials that will prepare you for the unknown dangers and events that await you, you sense that something is wrong. Something unknown and inexplicable lurks in the dark void of space.

Every decision pushes you to the limits of your sanity. Will you find a safe harbour for humanity, or will the infinite darkness of space swallow you up?
